title: How to Make Coconut Muffins

steps.headline: Combine the butter, honey, buttermilk, and eggs together in a medium sized bowl.
Use a sifter to sift the flour, baking powder, and baking soda.
Add the coconut into the dry ingredients.
Put the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and combine well.
Spoon the batter into pre-greased muffin cups.
Bake the muffins for about 25 to 30 minutes.

text: Preheat the oven to 375ºF or 190ºC.  Combine the butter, honey, buttermilk, and eggs together in a medium sized bowl.  Use a sifter to sift the flour, baking powder, and baking soda.  Add the coconut into the dry ingredients.  Put the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and combine well.  Spoon the batter into pre-greased muffin cups.  Bake the muffins for about 25 to 30 minutes.
